publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4273 Bill Wilson: Renfrewshire Council and respectme’s Anti-bullying Service—That the Parliament commends Renfrewshire Council for its groundbreaking work with Scotland’s anti-bullying service, respectme, in creating a genuinely integrated and cross-departmental approach involving all who play a role in addressing bullying behaviour, including psychologists, teachers, social workers and police; notes the proactive approach taken in including prejudice-based bullying and cyberbullying advice and guidance, and applauds the intensive training being delivered to 80 staff across the area.
S3M-4273 Renfrewshire Council and respectme’s Anti-bullying Service (lodged on 29 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-4273 Renfrewshire Council and respectme’s Anti-bullying Service (lodged on 29 May 2009) Ms Wendy Alexander*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Christopher Harvie*
S3M-4273 Renfrewshire Council and respectme’s Anti-bullying Service (lodged on 29 May 2009) Ross Finnie*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4273 Renfrewshire Council and respectme’s Anti-bullying Service (lodged on 29 May 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-4273 Renfrewshire Council and respectme’s Anti-bullying Service (lodged on 29 May 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-4273 Renfrewshire Council and respectme’s Anti-bullying Service (lodged on 29 May 2009) Gil Paterson*, Sandra White*
